text: Peperomia subdiscoidea is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== * Santiana, J. & Pitman, N. 2004. Peperomia subdiscoidea. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Peperomia subdiscoidea
